com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.emx.security

Class CameronFixEMXSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.emx.security.CameronFixEMXSigner

  • public final class CameronFixEMXSigner
extends Object
    An adapter class for accessing the engine-independent EMXSigner class from CameronFIX.
    Author:
    Christopher J Burton, 26/Nov/2001.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameronFixEMXSigner(PrivateKey privateKey, X509Certificate certificate)
      Construct a CameronFixEMXSigner that will use the supplied PrivateKey and Certificate.

    • Method Detail

      • setCertificateManager

        public void setCertificateManager(EMXSigner.CertificateManager certificateManager)
        Set the CertificateManager that will return the certificate against which a signature will be verified. This method must be called if the CameronFixEMXSigner is going to be used for verification.
        Parameters:
        certificateManager - the CertificateManager to set

      • sign

        public void sign(EMXMessage message)
          throws EMXSigner.MessageFormatException
        Sign a message. The supplied message is updated with the SignatureTime and the Signature.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to sign
        Throws:
        EMXSigner.MessageFormatException - TBD

      • verify

        public void verify(EMXMessage message)
            throws EMXSigner.CertificateNotFoundException,
                   EMXSigner.MessageFormatException,
                   EMXSigner.VerifyFailureException
        Verify a message. The supplied message is unchanged. TODO: I don't think this method can possibly work as it stands. We need to retrieve that certificate to be used for verification from the truststore (and it needs to be stored there, of course!), using the certificate serial number in the signature field as an index.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to verify
        Throws:
        EMXSigner.CertificateNotFoundException - TBD
        EMXSigner.MessageFormatException - TBD
        EMXSigner.VerifyFailureException - TBD
